text:
Do you really want to drift off to
sleep with your airport gate open?
You do not. Please close the gate.

You have company! Save the
sleeping for later.

The gate is closed, but you need to
turn off network communications
at the airport before you sleep.

You need to close the Island
Designer app before sleeping.

You're playing with friends right now!
Save the sleeping for later.

You look very cool, but you'll have
to undo your transformation before
drifting off to sleep.
